summary: This is an internal email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding upcoming events for the week of July 29, 2019, related to the Jeffrey Epstein case. It notes a pretrial conference scheduled for July 31 and a meeting between the prosecution team and defense attorneys on August 2.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the upcoming pretrial conference and related legal meetings.

events.title: Pretrial conference in Epstein case
events.description: A pretrial conference scheduled for 11 a.m.

events.title: Prosecution-defense meeting
events.description: The Epstein prosecution team is meeting with defense attorneys, who have a proposal to present.

keyFacts: A pretrial conference in the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled for July 31, 2019, at 11 a.m.
The prosecution team and defense attorneys were set to meet on August 2, 2019, with the defense having a proposal to present.
The correspondence is internal to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), indicating active case management in late July 2019.
